page.title: 03Shopping Precinct,Witham
page.content: On the outskirts of Witham there is a small shopping precinct.It has eight shops;a newsagent,a Chinese take-away, a launderette,a hairdresser,a clothes shop,a greengrocer,a supermarket and a chemist.The newsagent sells things like newspapers,sweets and tobacco and has about six hundred customers per day.The supermarket sells mainly foodstuffs and has goods delivered daily.It has ten assistants and most of its customers are women.The chemist is a much smaller shop selling toilet requisites and has an average of thirty customers per day.The clothes shop sells all types of clothing and also has an average of thirty customers per day.The greengrocer purchases fresh produce regularly from Covent Garden and has approximately 40 customers per day.Saturday is the busiest trading day of the week.
